summary: Drama based on Russian writer Fyodor Dostoevsky's homonymous novel about the proud Karamazov family in 1870s Russia.
cast: Yul Brynner|Maria Schell|Claire Bloom|Lee J. Cobb|Albert Salmi|William Shatner|Richard Basehart|Judith Evelyn|Edgar Stehli|Harry Townes|Miko Oscard|David Opatoshu|Simon Oakland|Frank DeKova|Jay Adler|Gage Clarke|Ann Morrison|Mel Welles|Walter Bacon|George Barrows|George Blagoi|Sam Buffington|Gene Coogan|Giselle D'Arc|Jimmy Dime|Paul Frees|Molly Glessing|Leonard Graves|Clare Higgins|Harry Hines|Charles Horvath|Richard LaMarr|Gustave Lax|Peter Leeds|Len Lesser|Michael Mark|Gregg Martell|Shepard Menken|Dorothy Neumann|Gloria Pall|Guy Prescott|Diana Quick|Bob Reeves|Stafford Repp|Jerry Riggio|Stephen Roberts|Ziva Rodann|Scott Seaton|Hal Taggart|William Vedder|Friedrich von Ledebur|Than Wyenn
title: Los hermanos Karamazov
